question: Question_C_03_(a)
statement:
This question is about approximating the value of $b = \sqrt{48}$.

\textbf{(a)} Between which two successive integers does \emph{b} lie?
sols:
The number 48 is between perfect squares 36 and 49, so we have:

$\begin{array}{rcl}
36 &< 48 &< 49 \\
\sqrt{36} &< \sqrt{48} &< \sqrt{49} \\
6 &< b &< 7 \end{array}$
hints: Which numbers near 48 are perfect squares? What are their square roots?
